entry.title: Sending Emails with PDF attachments in Drupal 7
entry.summary: I wrote my first blog post on the company blog the other day. It was about the frustratingly poorly documented problem of sending emails with attachments in Drupal. I also add on a neat little trick for hijacking the print module to print pdf versions of content on the site, and pipe it directly into the attachment - no saving a copy of every pdf you generate on the site.
